content.detailedDescription:
Ok my nephew texted me and told me there was a sunbow happening right then.  so i walked to a cleared area and pulled out my samsung galaxy s 5 active.   "i take tons of sky pictures"  anyways i took probably 35 pictures of the sunbow before it dissipated.   i was showing friends and family when i saw a pretty normal looking lens glare, that is normally caused by aiming the lens at something that is extremely bright... like the sun.  but when i zoomed in i noticed that the glare was round and had four distinct lights on it, evenly spaced and very bright.  so i looked at some of the other pics and saw that the object did not only move "which is expected" but changed colors had an aura about it and most importantly the 4 white lights on the circular object changed to 5 and 6 and changed locations on the object.  i have one picture that the "glare" is not even reflective.  it just looks like a grey silver object with the four lights on it.  that's what really peaked my interest.  i uploaded many of the pictures on facebook but no one had a good explanation.    even my photographer friends couldn't explain why the dots showed up and why the changed on the object.    

if you are not able to zoom in on the pictures i'm submitting, please let me know and i can provide more zoomed in pictures
content.summary: Taking pics of a sunbow and after checking my pics i zoomed in on what i thought was lense flare

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back seat of my dad's car, we where going home from a church service. it was after 9 pm, i was staring out the left window as we were traveling past the school. i noticed strange lights above the lunch hall and thought it was a helicopter at first, but the us had no helicopters that looked like the object. i was an aviation buff at an early age. i could barely make out the top section but it was close to the classic movie saucer ufo shape. there were several port holes around the top section which gave away its shape. there was a round protruding section on the bottom that emitted a low bluish tone glowing light. it was hovering directly above the lunch hall which gave me an idea of its size, it was almost as wide as the lunch hall. it was hovering about 30 to 50 feet above the hall. i looked for any signs of people but found none in the area. the total observation time was about one minute, the time it took to drive past the school. attached is a map that indicates where and approximate size of the ufo over the lunch hall. i am now a retired pilot and have seen many lights that were explainable but have never seen anything like this since.
content.summary: Ufo over school lunch hall

content.detailedDescription:
December 25, 1985 on forest st. in the dawn acres section of leicester, ma approx.9-9:30 in the evening.  two of us were bringing a relative home and we turned the corner onto forest street.  we stopped our vehicle in the middle of the road in absolute awe of huge light in the sky.  it was not the moon or a star. it was huge and it was close. all 3 of us exited the vehicle - in the middle of the road.  the neighborhood was quiet and still. two of us ran for the house.  one stayed outside and observed the craft take off in a blink at an unbelievable angle. one ran around the house shutting shades and one called the cops. we were so terrified and in shock not comprehending what we had seen.  an officer responded,  however the craft was gone when the officer arrived.  reporting now in case somebody else saw what i saw.   i had 2 other similar sightings in that neighborhood of hovering lights.  no sound, slow hovering movement.  no observable craft outline - just exceedingly bright light.  not a star or the moon.  not anything i could comprehend or explain.  i have used a pseudo name and would like to remain completely anonymous.  this information is for your data base only.  if there were other similar sightings in that neighborhood i would be interested to know.
p.S.Two surviving witnesses.  one in massachusetts, one in oregon.
content.summary: Hovering silent light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
While spending the weekend with my dad in camp verde az, i went outside at about 9pm.  while standing outside i saw something moving slowly north to south approximately 100 ft away and about 100 ft up at the closest point. it was not making any sound, just slowly moving from my left to my right.  it took about 20 minutes from when i first noticed the lights until suddenly the direction changed from north to south to head east suddenly at a right angle and increased speed and disappeared from sight in less than a minute.
i was aware that whatever it was, was not a plane or helicopter. there was no sound or wind and was moving too slowly to be a plane.
i was not scared, just amazed. it was like nothing i had ever seen before or since.
i went inside and told my dad.  he said it was probably a helicopter, and laughed when i tried to explain how it moved and disappeared. 
i shut up and dropped the whole thing. i have not reported this before because i did not want to be laughed at again.
i lost sight of the object when it suddenly made a right angle turn and accelerated quickly to the east.
content.summary: Three white/yellowish lights in triangle pattern with reddish  light ih the center

content.detailedDescription: I was turning left at the lights, on my usual route to work at dusk.  i suddenly noticed there was a huge tower on the corner, but there was no tower, just a black triangular ship that was slowly hovering over the road, steadily flying west to east along the south side of highway 22 along the north end of london, canada.  it made no sound.  i raced up to the lights and chased the ship through the outdoor shopping mall parking lot.  i drove the length of the lots to the walmart where the woods begin.  i watched the ship fly over the trees out of sight into the fog.  it was 2012, before i owned a smartphone, so i had no camera.  all i could do was watch it with eyes peeled every moment until it went out of sight.  it was about 60 feet across and not more than 10 storeys up--probably more like 5.  it was right above me--and if it made a sound i could not hear it. it is possible it was the x-47b, but what was it doing in canada--and not on a navy ship?
content.summary: Driving to work, turning left at light, as i turned i suddenly saw a black triangle hover over the road

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the street going, while back to a friends place in wilton manors. someone else pointed the objects out. wasn't sure if it was a ufo or not. i am doubtful/skeptical... let the experts look at my video and deicide what it was. the objects disappeared into the clouds while flying on what appeared to be a straight line.
content.summary: Flew in straight line and dissapeared into clouds/haze

content.detailedDescription: It was me david james (16) and my friend brian berry (16). we were walking down the street when we seen a bright orange ball hovering over us for about a minute and a half when and wen i tried video tapping it, it stopped hovering then started flying again super fast and we were trying to follow it but it was to fast but right when we were ready to give up it changed direction suddenly and came back at us fast and hovered again for approximately 50 seconds when i brought out my camera to video tape it again i seen a very bright flash of light and it disappeared in the blink of an eye.
content.summary: It hovered for 1 minute and a half

content.detailedDescription: Camping at freemont state park standing at the back of my van deciding what to have for diner one of six of us noticed three ufos hovering at treetop and told the other five of us. we looked for a couple of minutes then one of them moved silently and turned at a 60%angle and stoped in front of us at 90ft above 50ft in front of us. it was disk shaped with a small half bubble on the bottom pulsating colored lights.It was grey in color with a raised parabola on top 50ft in diameter. the bottom of the craft was blurry like it was emminating field the top was crisp.It hovered for about nine minutes i looked away twice for about 20 seconds.It then moved in a straight line then turned at a 60% angle traveled to the other two (its movement was in the shape of a triangle {60%,60%,60%} silently. then the three accelerated instantly to a high rate of speed to the south.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered at treetop then moved and turned at 60%angle then hovered above us one of three for 9 minutes then the one returned to the other two and departed looked away twice during hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house around dinner time 5 or 6 pm. i think it was during the summer but i am not positive what time of year it was. it was a cloudy day, with low clouds. i noticed a round red light moving slowly along the sky somewhat covered by the clouds and then not, like it was going through semi-clouds. it was about a few hundred feet above the houses. i'm not sure how high, but it was not that high up.I thought it was a low flying airplane but could only see the red light on the bottom of the plane through the parts of clouds. i thought it was weird as it was moving so slow, as if it was looking for something.(my thoughts)as i walked, it seemed to moved with me, since i was not walking fast, it was not moving fast like a plane would be. i kept watching it as i was walking thinking to myself and i was asking myself what could it be since i could not see the rest of the "plane". then it just stopped! so i stopped, the red light stopped in mid air, and that is when i knew it was not a plane. then a few seconds later, out of the clouds above the red light, a whitish- blue beam of light appeared just above the red light. the light was wider at the top then came to a point just above the red light. from where i was standing the distance between the end of the beam and the red light was about a foot or two. i said to myself out loud, "i will s*** myself if that light goes up to that beam" and the second i said that, it rose up towards the beam and the second it touched the beam, they both disappeared. the beam was about 3 to 4 feet long and about 2 feet wide getting thinner towards the red light. a v shape. that is about the size from where i was standing looking at it. i instantly ran home screaming to my mother and brother in the kitchen that i just saw a ufo and tried to tell them what i saw but they just laughed. but i know what i saw. that was almost 40 years ago and i remember it like it was yesterday. my sister and i have seen ufo's before this too. silver saucers, which i will tell you in another story.
content.summary: Saw red light moving slowly across sky then stopped. a beam of light came down from about it and it moved to it and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work on imhoff rd north bound. i saw a very very bright light in front of me heading west  bound. it looked  cone shaped with 2 blinking lights on  the sides. main light in middle  was  extremely bright. i watched it  as  it  crossed over me as  i turned  right on slater rd.  no noise.... looked  like  it could have  come  from the lummi reservation. i lost  sight of it as  i went down slater rd and  turned  in to casino drive way. lived  in this area  all my   life. i know  what a airplane looks like  and  this  wasn't  it.....
content.summary: Cone shaped  object with one very very very bright light and 2 white lights on the  side

content.detailedDescription: On october 10 1981 1:00am eastern time my brother started screaming dad hurry up come in my room when my dad did my brother had is curtains opened  and his room was glowing red we all came in there to see a large red fire ball coming from the south east headed for the house and then it change direction south and hovered over between our house and our neighbors home about 30 to 40 ft from both roof tops it emitted a green light that bent the trees apart with no sound and no cracking of the tree limbs or branches ,just north of the trees about 12ft was our above ground pool that was covered for the season with a black cover the ball hovered for about 10 to 15 minutes with the green light moving the trees back and forth we were just in shock of what we were seeing my father at this time ran to his room and grabbed his riffle and headed down the stairs to the back door and opened it when he stepped out on to the patio the ball shot up and just vanished .The next morning we contacted the medford police department and told them that we know your going think this sounds crazy and before we could say anymore the officer said are you reporting a ufo because if so we have had over 1000 calls so my father gave his name and address , about an hour later the walbornes our next door neighbors called and said that they could not open any of their doors to get out of their house even the windows were jammed my dad went over there and had remove. their doors which had to plained we think the ball caused this it settled their home some how very strange, that year there was a rash of ufo sightings in nj .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large glowing red ball .

content.detailedDescription: During my time in the military my unit was sent from ft. carson co. to ft. mcoy wisconsin to resettle the cuban refugees that castro sent over on the boats . after we arrived at ft. mcoy the cuban refugees rioted and torn the compound down and my unit had to provide a show of force to preclude refugee escapes etc. .At one point the entire battalion had to physically man the the securityfence to contain any major disturbances . around 11 september at about 930pm while i was getting into my sleeping bag to sleep as i was sitting on the ground inside my bag i happened to look up through a clearing in the treeline and witnessed a rectangular object that was clearly an ufo . it was moving just above the treeline from right to left of my position and was weirdly brightly lite . my lietenant was standing right beside me and saw it and about 40 to 50 other soldiers were standing out on the road some distance from me and i could see they were looking at it also and it looked like i might have seen a couple soldiers taking pictures possibly. this incident happened in sept. of 1980 and most people who used cameras back then only had the 110 camera type. as the ufo moved slowly across the starlite sky i observed what i thought were two unknown looking intites standing at a window or observation port looking right back at us . i watched go by for about 2 minutes and it just went across in front of my position untill it disappeared behind the treeline... it never moved up or down in any way ; it just moved from right to left of my position with the bright stars in the background except where the ufo was . i couldn't see any stars where and when as the ufo passed by because the area the vehicle\ ufo covered was absent of stars in the night.Some of this report i've probably left out some information because its hard for me to put into words what i witnessed and how it moved and sounded ; i much rather tell the report to someone and let them clarify my observations with some one with some experience. the craft was huge and was seen up close and personal if you know what i mean ...  have kept this to myself for over 30 years and cant do it any more . remember the other witnessses also . i was not alone .
content.summary: Ufo was rectangler and moving right to left above tree line moving steady and slow at about 930 pm  at night  making a slight humming or vibrating sound as it passed by  and was observed apprximately 2.5 minutes as it went by

content.detailedDescription: Was taking picture of storm clouds.  no camera flash and not through glass.  did not notice lights (mid picture in clouds) until looking at picture the next day.  was told to submit photo to this site to see what others think the lights might be.
content.summary: Noticed in photo later

content.detailedDescription:
This is the third consecutive night that uaps flew toward the air force base in the early evening after 8:30pm, which has, i believe, established a pattern.  there were two events: one began at 8:31 and the other at 8:40. in both cases, the objects appeared in the east and traveled south at about the same altitude.

again, i used the 4" refractor, nikon digital camera, remote release to reduce vibration and heavy tripod for capture. again, the objects come from the east heading south, toward the base.  object speed didn't appear to change.  however, object size, color, brightness, and shape did, as did the observable structures on the craft.

their color ranged from green to red and blue and white.  the objects showed protuberances or spikes.  their gross shapes also changed. they appeared to rotate, revealing additional aspects and shapes. 

i captured 36 serial images.
content.summary: For the 3rd consecutive early evening siting of objects headed for the military base to the south.

content.detailedDescription: Observed what first appeared to be a tall lighted tower over sarasota florida.  we saw a verticle strand of 6-8 bright orbs spaced apart with a secondary set of 4 parallel appearing to be a second tower.  the objects were motionless for the 10 minutes we observed them. as we were trying to recall the mystery tower thinking it was new the objects turned organge and began to move slowly in a counter clockwise motion. some of the objects ascended some decended then stopped. one by one they began to disapear until only 2 were observable. these turned white again as the ascended vertically through the clouds and out of sight. my wife and i were spechless. tried to take photos with i phone. only one photo capurted an orb.
content.summary: Observed verticle string of 6 bright white lights above horizon to 30 degrees up.. second string adjacent vertical of 3 hovering

content.detailedDescription:
mid to late summer 1985 walking south from my house with a friend to his house. noticed a green light coming from the west mountains directly over kennecott copper mine heading east.  my friend and i noticed it and stoped where we were and watched it come towards us. i never heard a sound  coming from the craft  until it was almost directly above us. the only sound i heard was a kind of buzzing or rumbling and you could almost feel it going right through you, sound that is. once it was directly above us we argued a little bit about how high it was and how big it was. we both agreed it was probably somewhere between once it was directly above us we argued a little bit about how high it was and how big it was. we both agreed it was probably somewhere between  500 to 1000 feet high.  i remember it was hard to gauge how high it was  because of it's immense size.  we also guessed it to be about 1000 feet long and approximately 250 to 300 feet across.   there were three distinct separate cigar shaped crafts, not visibly or structurally joined but  moved as one vehicle the entire time.  each one was separated from the other by about 25 to 50 foot spaces. we lived in the flight path to salt lake international airport i have seen planes come in fairly low but i have never seen anything  close to this size in the sky, even down low.  i am guessing it took about 15 to 20 minutes for the craft to go from  the oquirrh mountains in the west to disappearing over the wasatch mountains to the east of the salt lake valley,  mountains in the west to disappearing over the wasatch mountains to the east of the salt lake valley,  probably about 15 miles across. it never changed speed or course and pretty much stayed the same color kind of a greenish blue to a bluish green. after it disappeared over the wasatch mountains we discussed some things in amazement and wondered what we have seen.  we started walking towards my friends house again, when a friend of mine that was about a year older than me came down the street towards us pretty fast, and asked us if we had seen something in the sky. we both said yes and began talking to him about it, he said he was at a friends house near herriman utah and had been chasing it towards the east until it disappeared over the wasatch mountains. about a minute or two later a salt lake county sheriffs car turn onto our street with its lights on, pulled up alongside the three of us and asked the same questions. he stated  there have been several calls about it and he had also seen it for a short time but did not know what it was either. this took place about 30 years ago and i do not remember much more.  i do remember talking about it with my mom and i do remember her saying that she had talked to several friends that either seen it or heard about it also.  my friend and i did not discuss it much either after that night and i had thought at one time i had probably just imagined the whole thing.  i ran into the same friend  about 10 years ago and we both kind of brought it up again then. we both said kind of the same things about thinking we may have imagined it  all these years, but after our discussion, we both remembered the same story  in detail.  neither of us still have any idea of what we had seen but it was nice to get a little bit of confirmation from each other that it wasn't just something we imagined.  
thanks for listening, i hope there has been others that may have reported this, i would like to hear their stories. by the way even though the sheriff said there was multiple reports, we watched the local news for a couple of days, which is not something 15-year-old boys do and there was absolutely no reports. to my knowledge there was no pictures or video taken.
content.summary: West to east path mountain to mountain 3 greenish blue citation shaped triangle like 2 on bottom 1 on top 1000' x150' each one1000' x 300' all together

content.detailedDescription: On a vacation was out on the balcony looking at the other ships then i saw a dolphin swimming in the waterway. i was watching a huge ship come in and underneath it was a black shadow triangle/ boomerang silent just going out the water way. we were in the port of miami. it was huge like the size off a b2 bomber. it really freaked me out there was coastguard and all ships and people and it was huge silent and black.  i only saw it cause i was 5 stories up on a balcony
content.summary: I was on a cruise ship was looking at a dolphins   in the water there was a triangle object silently traveling under the cruise ships out towards the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i where enjoying a campfire.  i always look up to the sky. one time looking up;i noticed something coming towards us.My daughter was in the middle of telling me something.  she noticed i was fixated on something.She looked, and watched it hover above our heads.It was no higher then 20 feet above our heads. it was triangle in shape. dark shiny.The street light in front of the house put some light.From the tome i spot it and costed above our heads.We had eyes on it for agood 2 minutes. after it costed to far from eye sight. we looked at each other; and i asked, "did you see that?" she said,"yes, what was that?" i didn't have an answer.  i told a few friends and they laughed abd say,"it was a drone,man. " it didn't make a single sound. also, it was solid metal; and flew a straight line, flawless. 
i know what i saw!!!!! not a bird or a drone. that's what happened.
content.summary: Flew about 20 feet above daughter and i heads.  seen it approach and fly right above our heads 1.5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
2 neighbors, myself and my younger brother were aware that skylab (an orbiting space-station whose orbit was decaying) was going to burn up in our atmosphere on july 11, 1979 and since we knew the day and approximate time, we decided to climb up on the roof of my parents house in northglenn, co and see what we could see. i would've just turned 15 in april of that year by the way.

the 4 of us hadn't been up there for more than 5 minutes in an eastern direction when one of my neighbors said "look!" i looked behind us and saw an illuminated, silent disc about the size of a small plate, gliding over several of our neighbors homes and within 100 feet of passing over us.

i've always felt, even after 36 years that the disc "sensed" that we were looking at it and when we did, it suddenly changed direction.  it didn't turn or bank.  it just went in the opposite direction away from us. like a person might raise their arm up...And then down.  that gentle.

the disc never made a sound and glided away in a nice and slow manner just like it did as it came towards us. it was lightly illuminated so we could see its outline.  no sound, no rotors, no engines.  nothing.

one of my neighbors mentioned out loud "i wonder if that was skylab?"  kind of amusing as i think about it now. i can say that it changed my life forever and i've had other incidents since then.
content.summary: I watched a disc whose outline was illuminated glide silently towards us and once we oberved it, it abruptly reversed its direction away.

content.detailedDescription: I was 13 years old, just got done playing with a girlfriend at her house in our neighborhood.  it was just getting dark and as i was walking home, i saw this thing hoving very close right above me.  it was like a cone-triangle shape. no sound at all. it had lights all the way around the bottom and one light at the top of the pointed cone.  i was so scared, i ran home very quickly.  that is all i remember about this but i have never seen it in any photos online of ufos
content.summary: I was 13 years old and saw this ufo very close to me hoving above me

content.detailedDescription: Slow moving orange orbs were were seen by many people at the event moving fairly slow in the night sky above the buildings at the stonewall pride street festival. many of us were looking up trying to figure out what we were looking at but noone could figure it out. there was no sound and the orbs were equidistant apart from one another and were flying at the same altitude in a straight line heading north/northeast before diminishing one by one in the sky. there was no way these were flares because we saw them coming from a distance and they remained at the same altitude for the 10-15 minutes that we noticed them heading toward the crowd.
content.summary: Bright low flying orange orbs above the stonewall pride festival in wilton manors fl.

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst standing in the parking lot of our restaurant we noticed a huge boomerang shaped craft pass directly overhead. it had a dark surface, non reflective and had two large white lights at either wingtip.It was huge as it was very high up and still looked big. as we watched it pass over it just simply faded out. thinking that we had seen something strange we all then turned to walk back inside when not one but two orange orbs flew by in the same direction. this was not just witnessed by my entire staff that i called to come have a look but also 5 guys thy were chatting in our car park also saw the entire sighting. that makes 9 people all together all looking up all seeing all three craft. time of boomerang 18:45pm going directly north over the city
 the first orb at 19:20 and the second at 19:33 both moving north basically following the larger craft.
content.summary: Whilst standing in the parking lot of our restaurant we noticed a huge boomerang shaped craft fly directly overhead. dark surface two large whote lights at either "wingtip" and as it passed over it literally faded and disappeared. followed by 2 orange orb

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice sunny day, perfect for a walk.  i, as well as two of my friends, went down to the waterfront and noticed the tide was out. we decided to take a walk across the sea bed to take some photos of the shoreline. as we were leaving i had this feeling come over me to take one last picture of the lighthouse, so i quickly turned around and snapped the shot. we hadn't noticed the ufo at this time because it made no sound. i was about to show the pictures to a friend when i noticed an object in the sky above the lighthouse in the last picture i had taken.  it looked as if this triangular-shaped object was either hovering or flying by.  i uploaded the original photo along with a couple edited versions.
content.summary: Took a few photos of summerside and came across a ufo in one of my pictures.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was fathers day weekend 2013, we where having a get together for the holiday. my self, my husband justin, my father rob, his long-time girlfriend lynn, and two neighborhood friends where at my house that nigth. it was around 10pm when my dad decided to go outback and put some more steaks on the grill because him, lynn, and myself where all hungry again. he had been out on the back porch with lynn maybe 20 mins, when i heard frantic yelling from my dad to come out back. everyone in the house immediately ran to my dad thinking surely there had been some kind of accident. what we saw when we stepped through the backdoor stunned us all.
immediately after stepping on the porch we all saw 6 glowing orange lights in the sky. as i gazed at the lights i had no clue what i was seeing, but it occured to me rather quickly this was something id never seen before in my life. the lights definately not any aircraft id ever seen, and they where all too big and too uniform to be a lanturn or something of that sort. i immediately ran up the steps to the upstairs neighbors balcony to get a better view as the tall trees and thick treeline of the backyard was blocking my view. once my vantage point was better i reached for my phone to try to get a video but to my surprise it was completely dead when it should have had atleast 1/2 a battery left. i remember feeling awestruck, i just could not believe what we where seeing. i remember asking my husband, 
"are you seeing this? can you believe what we're seeing?". later i couldn't believe i wasn't scared. this is exactly what i remember seeing, almost two years exactly to the date as i write this:
i observed 6 glowing orange oval shaped lights traveling at a constant speed in the sky. the lights where in the eastern sky traveling north, they where all traveling the same constant speed, and the first 5 where all equally spaced in a line the last light trailed behind the first 5 but was traveling in the same line as the others. they made no sound, and didnt seem to cast light but just glowed. we watched these strange lights travel across the sky before us for 2-3 mins, it could have been less time but its hard to say, when you see something like that time is like it is when your waiting for police or emergency vehicles to arrive after an accident, one minute just seems to take 5 times longer then normal. then it got stranger, the first light just dissappeared. it was there then it wasn't. then as the other 5 lights reached the same exact spot in the sky they also disappeared. the event was over, we all looked at eachother in disbelief and awe. the next day i didnt hear anything about it on the new, which surprised me surely other people had to have seen this, and a small airport is down the street, butler county regoinal airport. later anytime i told this story to people, i always say afterward, "and thats my ufo story, im not saying they where drove by aliens, but they where definately unidentified flying objects."
content.summary: During a fathers day get together, myself and 6 other people observed 6 glowing orange lights/objects in the sky. they moved north in a straight line at a steady pace, once they each reached a spot in the sky they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:00 pm and my husband and i and our 4 year old son were going to run up to the store. we were on cherokee trail heading into town (tallassee) when i pointed and said "look at that beautiful star" (way up in the eastern/south eastern sky) and just about as soon as i said that, the "star" zoomed (for lack of a better word) to about 20 or 30 yards away from us, running parallel to our truck at about tree-top level. it continued to follow us for about 2 miles and it changed speeds to stay in course with us (when we slowed it slowed, when we sped up, it sped up). this whole time my husband and i were discussing what it could possibly be and the suggestion of a helicopter or some kind of aircraft came up so we decided to stop to see if we could hear anything or just to check it out. when we stopped it went down about 50 yards in front of us (it was still parallel with us at this time) then it came over the top of the trees and hovered in the middle of the road about 50 yards in front of us and just sat there (kind of like some sort of stand-off). we rolled our windows down to see if we could hear anything and there was no sound at all. we sat there for about a minute and that's when we began to get seriously scared. so we turned the truck around and we proceeded to go back towards our house and then it started following us, getting closer and closer to our bumper. my husband continued to accelerate and we got upwards about 90 mph and by that time it was within inches of our bumper. we continued that speed all the way back to the house, then we turned right into the driveway and it turned left and went over behind some trees about 100 yards away. we got out of the truck and i ran our son inside. my husband claims that he could see still see its lights through the trees. my husband soon came inside also. then we went back out and it was gone. we went into town later that night and asked the gas station clerk if she had seen anything or if anyone else had come in with strange sightings and she said no. we were the only ones on that road that night also. and evidently no one else saw what we did because there was never any mentions of any strange activity that night.
content.summary: Appeared like a star, then was on top of us and gave chase

content.detailedDescription:
Summer evening just a few miles south of washington, dc.

i was 27 years old, employed by a local defense contractor, living in a high-rise apartment building called southern towers of alexandria, and on this particular night stepped out onto my balcony just to take in the view. 

while standing there 12 stories off the ground and looking out at the traffic of i-395, i noticed movement in the sky and observed what appeared to be a series of lights emitting from a large, dark, boomerang shape, moving east at approximately 2000 feet above the ground. the lights very closely resembled stars, but were conspicuously moving in tandem across the sky with a large black background. since reagan national airport was due west from me by less than 10 miles, i at first assumed it to be the underside of a passenger jet's wings, decorated in lights, but immediately realized a jet at that distance would be making a deafening noise, and this sighting was soundless. 

i turned toward the apartment and shouted for my roommate, alan, to come take a look. he was on a corded phone at the time, and took a moment to set the phone down and come to the balcony. i kept following this strange, lighted boomerang across the sky, when suddenly the lights broke apart and shot off in every conceivable direction until they faded from sight. my roommate, naturally, was too late to see anything.

i've only recounted this story once in the 25+ years since, but watching your show has inspired me to share it with you. i've never thought of what i saw in terms of extraterrestrial intelligence, but i do know that this object was flying, and it was most definitely unidentifiable.
content.summary: Hundreds of lights congregated in boomerang shape cruise past in formation, then disperse in all directions

content.detailedDescription: The event happened to me during the summer of 1977 as i was returning to fort hood texas. fyi: i had taken a leave from the us army and drove home to oregon going across the southwest then up through california. after spending time with my folks and siblings i headed back to fort hood. i headed east from portland through the columbia gorge and eventually came down through the texas panhandle back to fort hood. at the time i thought it would be cool to do a loop through half of the us. as i reached texas i decided to drive through the night to make sure i made it back on post on time (i didn't want to get written up for being awol). i was somewhere in the texas panhandle heading south on a 2 lane road (on the map it looked like it was a straighter line than the main road i had been on) and i'm guessing it was about 3 o'clock in the morning (it was a couple of hours later when it started to get light so 3am is just a guess). i couldn't find a radio station and there was no other traffic on this road and there were no lights from houses in the distance. i was doing everything i could think of to stay awake. i kept changing my visual focus from near the front of my car to beyond my headlights to my speedometer to near the front of my car, etc. i was doing what i could to maintain my speed and not fall asleep and die in one of the ditches on either side of the road. during one of these focus jumps it seemed like there was a pale greenish light shining down on my car. then i noticed it wasn't just the hood of my car but the area around my car seemed to be getting brighter. i started to slow down trying to figure out what was going on and noticed the light was slowly getting brighter. there were now shadows indicating a light source high up to my left, but the shadows were getting narrower like something was moving directly over my car, but the shadows kept moving and getting brighter as if the light were coming down at a diagonal starting somewhere above me to my left and aimed slightly off to my right. i had stopped the car at this point and was leaning over my steering wheel to see if i could see the source of this greenish light. i couldn't get far enough forward to see what was above me as the light continued to get brighter then through the passenger window i saw the light plummet behind a patch of small trees through the passenger window and went out. whatever it was i'm guessing it measured about the width of the clump of trees across, maybe 30 feet across. the clump of trees was maybe 50 feet from my car. i sat there waiting for the explosion because it seemed like something must have crashed behind the trees but there nothing. i sat in the car, did a quick check and the car was idling, i had the clutch in and one hand on the stick shift, i was in first gear, and the other hand on the steering wheel. there were no lights in my mirrors or anywhere around me. it was pitch black on a 2 lane highway somewhere in texas. i was thinking if i should see what was behind those trees when i noticed the hood of my car was reflecting green light again. the same thing happened again, a dim light getting lighter then plummeting behind the clump of trees to my right. but this time my car wasn't moving. as i sat there after the second light plummeted behind the trees and went out i thought "i'm 6 foot tall, i'm in the army, i've been trained by vietnam vets, i'm going to see what's behind those trees". that's when i panicked. my heart was pounding, i was frantically gulping down air, it was amazing i didn't hyperventilate. i remember being almost out of control as i struggled to get my seatbelt on, getting the parking brake disengaged, slamming the gearshift into first gear, and burning rubber as i sped as fast as i could away from those trees. it took me awhile to realize i was driving way too fast for the road. i didn't start to calm down until i was in an area where there were lights and cars. i was pretty embarrassed that i would panic for no reason. i still had a long drive to get to central texas so i focused on that. it was some time in the afternoon when i got back on post. as i was hauling my luggage into the barracks one of my squad members said i must have stories to tell with a scar like that. i was tired and thought he was just trying to be funny so i said something lame like "that'd be funny if there were a scar, but since there's no scar it's not funny". he looked me in the eye for a moment and said something like "then i don't see the scar" and walked away. later on i was washing my hands and noticed i did have a new scar. it was summer and i was macho so had a the top couple of buttons on my civilian shirt unbuttoned. there, running across the middle of my chest was a scar about 1 inch across that wasn't there when i left oregon. a couple of beers later i got up the nerve and thought about the lights disappearing behind those scrawny trees and my new scar. i remember stopping the car. i remember the car idling with my seatbelt on and the car in first gear. then i panic for no reason, fasten my seatbelt, take off the parking brake, put the car into first gear and miles later i'm told i have a scar. since i don't remember putting my car in neutral, putting on the parking brake, unfastening my seatbelt, or getting the scar i think all of the events are related. but i don't know. my family and i were watching an episode of hanger 1 and they convinced me that i should submit this odd event. so here i am. i don't think there's enough here to investigate. but even though nothing will probably come from this thank you for letting me write it up. it felt like some kind of therapy to write it all out. thank you.
content.summary: 2 vehicles disappeared behind trees. i stopped to investigate but don't remember leaving my car. arrived at my destination with a scar on my chest

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my night classes at ssu in portsmouth, ohio and driving  home by way of us 23.  it was about 10-11pm and in may 1994.  the night was clear and warm.  us 23 is very rural and there were only  one or two other cars out that evening.  a few miles before i reached the us grant bridge which crosses over to ohio rt. 52 (which was my usual way home) i noticed two or three pickup trucks/cars parked along the opposite side of us23.  i thought a few people were standing beside their vehicles, looking up at the sky.  then i noticed a very bright light up in the sky, which got nearer and nearer until it's shape was clearly that of the "traditional flying saucer"  it had lots of lights all around it and it was very large.  i'm not good at estimating size and distance so i'm not much help  here.  it was a grayish color, saucer shaped, bright white lights (oval shaped) all around it.  i heard no sound but it appeared so close that i suddenly got scared and pulled my vw over along the road and got out to look at it.  it keep moving very slowly and i felt what i can only describe as a power coming from it.  but, i am embarrassed to say, the craft which i was looking at from the  underside as it flew over , didn't stop to get me.  i didn't lose any sense of time (i don't think) and i just watched as it slowly moved to the east which was heading over to the ohio side of this area.  the greenup dam on the ohio river is where it briefly hovered but did not land.  i got back in my car and drove to the us grant bridge to us 52 heading towards ironton, ohio which is where i live.  i was shocked when i got home and nothing was reported on the local news about anyone seeing a ufo.  that night or any time after that.  of course, i didn't report it either although i often checked on the internet to see if anyone reported it.  there were a few cars/trucks on the other side of us 23 that night and i would think these people saw it, too.  they must have been scared to be called crazy like i was.  i only told my sister and a friend.  the friend said i was crazy.  but now that mufon is so well known and famous perhaps this sighting can be recorded and someone will look it up one day and say that they, too, saw that magnificent mysterious ufo near the ohio river one night in 1994. i wish i had a picture of what i saw that night.  but back in 1994, people didn't have all the phones and camera stuff that they do now.  different times for sure.  peace, kathi l. keeney
content.summary: Ufo was large and hovered over the greenup dam then quickly turned west and was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
See this hugh object with yellow,blue,green and red lights going around it.
we stood there me, mom and my three sisters watching this big football field size objecti asked mom what do you think they are doing? she said "probably what we were, watching us". then after what seemed like forever, maybe 10 minutes it lifted straight up and then, zip it was gone. i noticed that there were no sounds, no night sounds, chirps from crickets and frogs, it was as if all nature had stopped to see such a strange and beautiful
ufo. slowly the night sounds returned and we went back into the house, it was my sister's thirteenth birthday, and had cake. the next day mom sent us to see if anyone else had seen it, ot one person said they did. my dad was not into saying anything, people might think we were crazy. we never talked about it for years. then i wrote a children's book and want to get it published but who would, everyone will think i'm nuts. then i heard of you all and thought maybe you could help me get my story out there. there were dreams we had ,one of my sisters and i, after the encounter the dreams stopped. very strange.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Comming across our street after asking a friend over for my sisters birthday. we saw a very large ufo was hovering over the trees in our back yard, lights going around, got mom and sisters to w
